title: 关于skript代码的一个问题
author: lxc0123
txt_content:
RT，我用skript写一个垃圾插件，反正就是需要使用某个坐标的方块。
但是我不知道怎么在sk代码里面表示某个坐标的方块，求教，谢谢大佬。

replies.txt_content:
使用location at
set block at the location at xxx, xxx, -xxx of the world <世界名> to diamond block复制代码

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
Coordinate模型:
[the] (x|y|z)(-| )(coord[inate]|pos[ition]|loc[ation])[s] of %locations%
%locations%'[s] (x|y|z)(-| )(coord[inate]|pos[ition]|loc[ation])[s]
表示位置的一个坐标
示例:
player's y-coordinate is smaller than 40:
        message "Watch out for lava!"复制代码或者
Location模型:
[the] [event-](location|position)
[the] (location|position) %direction% [%location%]
事件发生的坐标
示例:
drop 5 apples at the event-location # exactly the same as writing 'drop 5 apples'
set {_loc} to the location 1 meter above the player复制代码
